item.title: 搜索
item.description: /* 手机适配 */ @media screen and (max-width: 500px) { .search{ padding-right: 25px; } .search input{ width: 100%; } .search button{ display: none; } } /* 电脑适配 */ @media screen and (min-width: 500px) { .search{ width: 500px; } .search input{ width: 444px; } } /* 通用样式 */ .search{ margin: auto; } .search input{ outline: none; border: 2px solid #c05b4d; height: 32px; padding:
